headline: Datadog Announces Date of Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2025 Earnings Call
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG), the AI-powered observability and security platform for cloud applications, today announced that it will report its fourth quarter and fiscal year 2025 financial results before the U.S. financial markets open on Tuesday, February 10, 2026. headline: Datadog Announces Upcoming Investor Day
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG), the AI-powered observability and security platform for cloud applications, today announced that it will host an Investor Day on Thursday, February 12 in New York City starting at 1:00 p.m. ET. For in-person attendance, please contact the Datadog Investor Relations team at IR@datadoghq.com for more information. For virtual attendance registration and webcast details, please click this link. headline: 3 Software Stocks to Sell Before AI Replaces Them Entirely
summary: Citi’s target cuts underscore that DDOG, FSLY, and TEAM face real AI‑driven competitive pressure and stretched multiples, so investors may want to exit or reduce positions before the market fully reprices these names for a slower, more crowded post‑AI landscape.

headline: 3 Software Stocks with Promising Prospects
summary: Software is rapidly reducing operating expenses for businesses. In the past, the undeniable tailwinds fueling SaaS companies led to lofty valuation multiples that made it easier to raise capital. But this was a double-edged sword as the high prices exposed them to big drawdowns, and unfortunately, the industry has tumbled by 11.2% over the last six months. This drawdown is a far cry from the S&P 500’s 10% ascent.
